'''''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack''''' is an album comprising of the soundtrack from the theatrical release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''. It was released [[25 November]], [[2003]]. An extended soundtrack, based on the extended edition of the film, was later released as ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - The Complete Recordings]]''.
